name: meridian-ai-workspace
description: Meridian AI workspace with React frontend and TypeScript backend

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix backend install
scripts.dev: echo "Use separate terminals: npm run dev:backend and npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm --prefix frontend run test && npm --prefix backend run test
